name: RE-PLAY
description:
REPLAY is a music learning serious game made during the "Kiss Your Teacher 2017" Gamejam, winner of the Second Best Game Prize during this event!

A MIDI device is required to have an optimal experience, but you can  still enjoy the game with your classic computer keyboard.

Team
  • Adam "La brosse" L'Hoir : 2D artist & Support FX
  • Anthony "Freden" : Sound designer & Music composer
  • Lauri "Lightbolt" Busa : FX artist
  • Maude "Maudster" L'Hoir : 3D & UI artist
  • Trystan "GaraQuor" Delhaye : Lead developer
  • Wendy "Shadowsun" Broeckx : Integrator & Developer
